alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 07 at 1:16PM AKDT until October 08 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow-covered roadways. Gusty winds could produce areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
